snippet: Rescue workers fought against powerful currents on Tuesday in hopes of recovering bodies from the ferry that sank, leaving more than 120 passengers missing and presumed dead.
abstract: Divers fight powerful currents and heavy rain while trying to recover bodies from river ferry that capsized in Bangladesh; officials say vessel was severely overloaded with passengers, and attempted river crossing despite warnings of severe weather.
lead_paragraph: Rescue workers fought against powerful currents on Tuesday in hopes of recovering bodies from the ferry that sank, leaving more than 120 passengers missing and presumed dead.

headline.main: Divers Fail to Find Bangladesh Ferry That Capsized
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: Storms Frustrate Attempt to Find Capsized River Ferry
